<h1 align="center">MiniBin - Utility for Emptying the Recycle Bin in Windows 10</h1>
<p align="center">Minibin is a small utility for emptying the Recycle Bin in the Windows 10 operating system. The program provides a convenient way to free up disk space by getting rid of files in the Recycle Bin.</p>
<hr>
<h2>Introduction</h2>
<p>Minibin is a small utility for emptying the Recycle Bin in the Windows 10 operating system. The program provides a convenient way to free up disk space by getting rid of files in the Recycle Bin.</p>
<h2>Peculiarities</h2>
<ul>
  <li><b>Automatically empty the trash:</b> The program provides the function of emptying the trash without user confirmation.</li>
  <li><b>Startup integration:</b> You can add the <code>minibin-kt.exe</code> executable file to the startup folder so that Minibin starts with the system.</li>
  <li><b>Dynamic tray icon:</b> The program dynamically displays the status of the recycle bin in an icon in the system tray.</li>
  <li><b>Periodic icon update:</b> The icon is updated every 10 seconds to reflect the current status of the cart.</li>
</ul>
<h2>Requirements</h2>
<ul>
  <li><b>OS:</b> Windows 10</li>
</ul>
<h2>Installation</h2>
<ol>
  <li>Download the latest release from the <a href="#">repository</a>.</li>
  <li>Unzip the archive to a convenient location on your computer.</li>
  <li>If desired, move the <code>minibin-kt.exe</code> file to the startup folder.</li>
</ol>
<h2>Usage</h2>
<ol>
  <li>Run the program by running minibin-kt.exe</li>
  <li>Right click on the tray icon to display available options.</li>
  <li>Select "Empty Recycle Bin" to delete files from the Recycle Bin.</li>
  <li>Select "Exit" to close the program.</li>
</ol>
<h2>Support</h2>
<p>If you like Minibin and want to support its development, you can do so on Patreon.</p>
